definitions.definition: All the electromagnetic radiation given off by the Sun , especially that in the visible spectrum that bathes the Earth .
examples: Sunlight on the skin gives you vitamin D.

definitions.definition: Synonym of photic ( “ describing that part of the near-surface ocean in which photosynthesis is possible. ” ) .

main_definition: All the electromagnetic radiation given off by the Sun , especially that in the visible spectrum that bathes the Earth .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Brightness, hope ; a positive outlook .
( attributive ) Synonym of photic ( “ describing that part of the near-surface ocean in which photosynthesis is possible. ” ) .
